meta.title: Complete Game Development Masterclass for Kids - From Player to Creator
meta.description: The ultimate 6-month game development program for kids and teens using visual tools like Scratch, Roblox Studio, Minecraft, GDevelop, and more. Create, publish, and monetize real games without complex coding. Perfect for ages 8-18!
meta.level: Complete Beginner to Advanced Game Creator

program_overview.title: Complete Game Development Masterclass for Kids
program_overview.tagline: Transform from Game Player to Game Creator in 6 Months!
program_overview.description:
This exciting 6-month journey transforms game-loving kids into game creators! Using kid-friendly visual tools, students will create 50+ games across multiple platforms - from simple 2D arcade games to complex 3D multiplayer worlds. No typing code required!

Students will master Scratch, Roblox Studio, Minecraft Education, GDevelop, and more. They'll learn game design, storytelling, level design, character creation, and even game monetization. By the end, they'll have a portfolio of published games and the skills to bring any game idea to life!
what_makes_this_different: 100% visual tools - no complex coding required
Create games that friends can actually play
Publish games online and to app stores
Game design theory made fun for kids

learning_path.phase_4: Publishing: Share games with the world!

phase_1_foundation.title: PHASE 1: Game Foundations & First Games (Months 1-2, Weeks 1-8)
phase_1_foundation.description: Master game thinking and create your first games using Scratch and basic tools. Learn what makes games fun!

week_1_2.title: Introduction to Game Development
topics: Types of games: arcade, puzzle, adventure, RPG
Basic movement: arrow keys and WASD
week_1_2.practice: Daily: Play and analyze 2 games, create 1 game mechanic

week_17.title: 2D Games Showcase
week_17.assessment: Complete 2D game from concept to publication

phase_2_frontend_mastery.title: PHASE 2: Advanced Game Development (Specialized Tracks)
phase_2_frontend_mastery.description: Choose specialized paths: Mobile Games, Multiplayer, VR/AR, or Competitive Gaming

phase_3_backend_engineering.title: SPECIALIZATION TRACKS: Choose Your Path
phase_3_backend_engineering.description: Deep dive into specialized areas of game development

phase_4_advanced_production.title: BONUS CONTENT: Advanced Specializations
phase_4_advanced_production.description: Optional advanced modules for continued excellence
